name: react-globalize-example
description: Examples demonstrating use of the components

scripts.clean: for DIR in tmp dist; do ( test -d $DIR && rm -rf $DIR ) && mkdir $DIR; done
scripts.build: npm run-script clean && npm run-script build-development && npm run-script build-production
scripts.build-production: ./globalize-compiler > tmp/globalize-precompiled-formatters.js && browserify --extension=.jsx --transform reactify --exclude globalize production.jsx > dist/production.js && uglifyjs dist/production.js > dist/production.min.js
